hero.title: survive at all costs
hero.subtitle: experience new social battle royale game

about.title: social battle royale game
about.subtitle: what is sos?
about.textFirst: Each round, you and 15 other contestants compete to escape a deadly island filled with monsters. The trick is: three people can survive. Will you run solo or form friendships with others to escape?
about.textSecond: Making the right decisions could be the difference between

accordion.firstText: You have 30 minutes to find a relic, signal for extraction, and grab one of three spots on the rescue chopper.
accordion.secondText: You have 30 minutes to find a relic, signal for extraction, and grab one of three spots on the rescue chopper.
accordion.thirdText: You have 30 minutes to find a relic, signal for extraction, and grab one of three spots on the rescue chopper.

requirements.subtitle: can my computer run this game?
requirements.title: system requirements

table.firstText: Windows 7 64-bit only (No OSX support at this time)
table.secondText: Intel Core 2 Duo @ 2.4 GHZ or AMD Athlon X2 @ 2.8 GHZ
table.fifthText: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 2GB or AMD Radeon HD 7850 2GB DirectX11 (Shader Model 5)

quotes.subtitle: what people think?
quotes.title: press quotes
quotes.text: Our goal is to create a product and service that you’re satisfied with and use it every day. This is why we’re constantly working on our services to make it better every day and really listen to what our users has to say.

firstQuote.name: evan lahti
firstQuote.text: One of my gaming highlights of the year.

secondQuote.name: jada griffin
secondQuote.text: The next big thing in the world of streaming and survival games.

thirdQuote.name: aarom williams
thirdQuote.text: Snoop Dogg Playing The Wildly Entertaining «SOS» Is Ridiculous.

newsletter.subtitle: want to stay in touch?
newsletter.title: newsletter subscribe
newsletter.text: In order to start receiving our news, all you have to do is enter your email address. Everything else will be taken care of by us. We will send you emails containing information about game. We don’t spam.

form.invalidFieldError: Please, enter a valid email address!

success.title: Subscription Confirmed!
success.message: Excellent! You'll now be among the first to know about all news and updates. We'll send you exclusive content, new feature announcements, and special offers. Check your email - your first message is on the way!
